title: Ushiro no Pleiades
description: Subaru, the basketball prodigy; Kou, the guy who's still struggling to get into their school's basketball team. Identical twins, but no identical abilities. An unfortunate accident that left one crippled and the other guilt-stricken. A bitter-sweet tale of sibling rivalry and how family love can indeed win out in the end. (Source: MangaUpdates)

matches.title: Welcome to the Competitive Dance Club
